scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation within an architectural setting. On the left, the Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe and with a golden halo, is shown kneeling before an open book, her hands clasped. To her right, the Angel Gabriel, with large white wings and wearing a white robe with a red cloak, kneels and presents a scroll with text. Behind them, an elaborate golden architectural structure with arches and columns frames the figures. In the background, through arched windows, a landscape is visible. Above the architecture, a bust of a man in red and blue attire is depicted within a circular frame.
